<!--title-->
# “Enemy Materials - Devil Pack” for "RPG Maker Unite" includes graphic assets based on the motif of Devil King and the Devil King’s castle.
<!--text-->
【About】
“Enemy Materials - Devil Pack” for "RPG Maker Unite" includes graphic assets based on the motif of Devil King and the Devil King’s castle.
It includes 5 patterns of the Devil King〈Boss〉/ 3 subspecies of the Devil King / 5 familiars of the Devil King / 3 types of the Devil King in human form (male / female / child) , and map assets for the interior and exterior of the Devil King Castle.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Demon King assets
The theme of this collection is the "Demon King," a powerful and vicious enemy among demons that often stands in the way of player characters. There are various forms of the Demon King, from the first form to the fifth form, and they are designed to be used as bosses.

This pack also includes 5 patterns of Demon King’s physical transformations!
Especially, the third ~ fifth form are humongous and suitable for use as last boss!



Demon King Form 1
Demon King Form 2: Muscular
Demon King Form 3: Berserk
Demon King Form 4: Giant Monster
Demon King Form 5: Ultimate

Included are 3 types of the Devil King in human form (male / female / child)that can be used as player-characters.
It can also be used for dramatic scenes such as "making the boss your ally"!
Includes faces, bust-up shots, walking and falling in the field map, and side-view motions for battle scenes.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Demon King’s Castle Map assets
"The Devil's Castle Exterior" and "Castle Map" are perfect for creating a castle that suits the last dungeon of your game!
=========================================================
Contents

・faces:3sheets（3 characters）
・pictures:3sheets（3 characters , upper body shots）
・characters:Damage 3sheets , Walk 12sheets
・sv_actors:18sheets × 3sets（3 characters）
・enemies:19sheets
・sv_enemies:19sheets
・system:25sheets（Child's Weapons images）
・maps:
　map_101:ground 13sheets , object 35sheets
　map_102:ground 28sheets , object 18sheets
　map_103:ground 28sheets , object 10sheets
　map_104:ground  9sheets , object 10sheets
=========================================================
